data.actual_result: The spacing makes the bottom section too close to the other content
data.expected_result: The spacing should be consistent with the other sections
data.short_description: Spacing under the "Squad Challenges" section in HypeSquad settings is too low
data.steps_to_repro: - You do not need to be in HypeSquad to reproduce this bug -   - Open User Settings - Click "HypeSquad" - Scroll down so you can see the bottom of the Squad Challenges section - Observe the "Interested in..." box (if you're not in HypeSquad), or observe the line under the section (if you have HypeSquad)
